titles.title: Exit the OECD Act of 2007
A bill to prohibit Federal funding for the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S789-790)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Exit the OECD Act of 2007 - Prohibits the expenditure of federal funds for activities or projects undertaken by the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD).
